short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop for your grocery and get  it delivery at your doorstep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ofidy Shopping Browser Extension, lets you securely and conveniently add an item from the web page(online shopping website) you are browsing to your shopping cart in Ofidy.com. You can then check out on Ofidy.com and make payment for all items in your cart by paying in just one currency - that could be your local currency. After payment, your orders will be processed and the items will be delivered to your delivery address.
